about.title: Meet Our Nutritionists
about.desc: Nutritionists, graduates of the Faculty of Technical Engineering, Food Department, Aleppo University. Holders of certificates from several courses in the field of nutrition and diet planning, more than three years of experience in helping people reach their nutritional goals, such as losing and gaining weight, following up on athletes, pregnant and lactating women, and people suffering from certain diseases such as irritable bowel syndrome, polycystic ovaries, and Vitamin deficiency

why.title: Why LHA
why.reason1: Great results in a record time
why.reason3: You will not be deprived of your favorite meals

footer.title: Reach Us
